text: Brandt Brauer Frick is a German electronic music ensemble from Berlin. The group's members are Daniel Brandt, Jan Brauer, and Paul Frick. The group's members are classically trainedReview of You Make Me Real, BBC and began performing together in 2009. The Guardian described them as a group composing "austere sonic experiments, from engineering complex minimalist techno to replicating the DNA of dance music using orchestral instruments."Live Review, The Guardian, March 21, 2013 Their 2013 release Miami involved production work and guest vocals from Om'Mas Keith. The group has made appearances at festivals such as Coachella, Glastonbury, and Haldern Pop. Paul Frick is now working as an official member of Tangerine Dream as of June 9, 2020. == Discography == === Albums === * You Make Me Real (!K7, 2010) * Mr. Machine (!K7, 2011) * Miami (!K7, 2013) * Joy (Because Music, 2016) * Echo (Because Music, 2019) ===Compilations=== *DJ-Kicks: Brandt Brauer Frick (!K7, 2014) === Singles and EPs === * Corky (Tartelet, 2011) * Bop (Tartelet, 2010) * Iron Man (Tartelet, 2009) * Wallah (The Gym, 2009) ==References== Category:German electronic music groups Category:Musical groups from Berlin Category:Because Music artists
title: Brandt Brauer Frick
